this.visibilty='hidden'; pause.visibility='visible'; question.speak='true'; option1.speak='true'; option2.speak='true'; option3.speak='true'; option4.speak='true'; option5.speak='true'; option6.speak='true'; this.visibilty='visible'; pause.visibility='hidden';

lido-text.string: The game has been indefinitely postponed.
lido-text.value: The game has been indefinitely postponed

lido-wrap.onEntry: this.padding='30px'; this.borderRadius='20px'; this.gridTemplateColumns='auto auto auto'; this.alignContent='space-around'; this.justifyItems='center';

lido-image.onTouch: this.visibilty='hidden'; pause.visibility='visible'; question.speak='true'; option1.speak='true'; option2.speak='true'; option3.speak='true'; option4.speak='true'; option5.speak='true'; option6.speak='true'; this.visibilty='visible'; pause.visibility='hidden';

lido-text.value: Match the animal names to their pictures
lido-text.string: Match the animal names to their pictures

lido-container.ariaLabel: This is a multiple-option question. Select one option from the list.

lido-image.onTouch: this.visibilty='hidden'; pause.visibility='visible'; question.speak='true'; option1.speak='true'; option2.speak='true'; option3.speak='true'; option4.speak='true'; option5.speak='true'; option6.speak='true'; this.visibilty='visible'; pause.visibility='hidden';

lido-text.string: Which animal is known as “the king of the jungle”?

lido-col.onCorrect: this.border='8px solid #65BC46'; this.boxShadow='0 0 30px #65BC46'; this.transition='box-shadow 0.2s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out'; this.transform= 'scale(1.05)';
